reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The little headset that could.
reviews.reviewText: Note: Originally, I did buy these used to save a few bucks. After discovering a break, I ordered a new pair and had significantly better results. If you use EQ, these even rival the 200-dollar kinds. Sony ZX-110s are known to be used by casual listeners to enjoy the support of EQ software. I've even seen people wear them while doing live covers. When professionals wear something, it's best to find out why and trust them on it. That's why I took a gamble and bought these.[When I bought used]I really really really wanted to like these. The cups were comfier than the standard zx110s, but the audio didn't come close to the standard. I compared the zx110nc to the standard zx110 I already owned and found it's volume and sound to be significantly less. While this did improve when I flicked on the "noise cancelling" switch, I noticed vocals were clearer and the sound was louder. I live alone, noise canceling had nothing to do with this performance. I tried to test it out with the tv on but could still hear the television. It seems the noise canceling can at most damper the noise of an electric heater. Nothing higher. You'd have to turn up your volume to the high twenties and even thirties to block out a person's conversation.For some reason, the pair I had had cracked speakers. Meaning the black plastic that covers the actual speaker was slightly cracked form a weak foundation. Not sure how this happened during manufacturing, most likely someone but manual blunt pressure and "popped" a crack into it.Sadly, the audio is great with the so-called "noise canceling" on, but not enough to support the idea of changing a battery every ten days if you listen for eight hours per day.I'll maybe buy it again to see if I just had a lemon. But there's a lot of reviews with the issues I had.I did buy new, and had a significant change of mind! I didn't realize how much two little cracks on the earpad covers could change so much![Second Attempt, bought new]Upon arrival, I was greeted to the firmness of the pads that help with my stemming and adhd symptoms. The sound was a lot better but slightly airy. That's when my mom pointed out, I needed to tighten the band. That's when the real results came, and even the noise canceling was a success. I didn't hear anything, not even the cars outside. I live near the airport, and I didn't hear the planes or the helicopters helicopters. I even didn't hear the TV that I forgot to turn off.If the sound is still not to your satisfaction. I highly HIGHLY suggest you use EQ. It's FREE. Honestly, the headsets don't even need them, just make sure the headband is NOT loose!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Reasonably priced and very good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sounds without disturbing someone in same room.
reviews.reviewText: Overall good, useable product for the price. Not best for listening over one hour (not comfortable to wear).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as Advertised
reviews.reviewText: These on-ear headphones are comfortable and effective, at a righteous price. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for the Price
reviews.reviewText: Had some high-end noise but for the price they are effective enough for what I wanted. I'd give 5 stars relative to the price but when comparing to other (more expensive) headphones they would not equal up. I'm very satisfied for the price.Update Oct 2023: I used these on the plane (again) and noticed a big difference when I slightly pressed the earpiece against my head. When I applied a little pressure the high-end noise went away and they were very quiet. I could not adjust the headphones to fit tight enough without pressing on them. Again for the price they are pretty good and maybe they will fit your head better than mine??

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Noise canceling headphones
reviews.reviewText: The product was nice and what I ordered. They arrived on time. One thing I don't like is they use up batteries very quickly. You have to change the batteries every 3 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works ok, feels ok
reviews.reviewText: Noise cancelling is not great, seems better suited for low-end noise. Probably be perfect for airplane noise. It does reduce general household noise some, but could be a lot better at that. Ear pads are a bit on the small side for me, but I'm a 6'2", 250 lb guy. Sound quality is pretty good, but if you want high-quality sound, these probably aren't for you.
Buen sonido, aunque no cancelan lo externo tanto como esperaba.
音の伸びが素晴らしい。奥行きがある音場作りで、耳へのあたりも強くなく、長時間でも疲れないのがいい。ノイズキャンセラーをonにした方が高音の伸びがいいようです。使い込んでどう変わっていくか、楽しみです。
Estos audífonos con cancelación de ruido son excelente opción para los vuelos, te permite ver las películas sin distraerte. Excelente sonido.

reviews.reviewTitle: 商品自体は良いと思います。
reviews.reviewText: 到着後すぐに試せば良かったのですが、返品期間を過ぎてから気がつきました・・・片耳からしか聞こえません。音質は良いです！

Tengo los Sony BX550 y cada que giras la cabeza pareciera se quebrará el plástico.Estoy son cómodos y no llegas a sentirlos en algún momento. La cancelación del ruido es perfecta.Mi abuela ya no escucha muy bien y para las videollamadas familiares le funcionan a la perfección.
